short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: On Amazon, this extension will display book availability in NC State University Libraries, TRLN, and WorldCat.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows users to search for books, CDs, DVDs on Amazon pages at Duke Libraries, TRLN Libraries, and WorldCat. 

For the previous version history, see Duke Amazon Browser - http://bit.ly/DukeAmazonBrowser 

Version 5.2
Updated the catalog statement to reflect the recent catalog system update.
